name: thaqalayn-api
description: API for hadiths found on the thaqalayn.net website

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../thaqalayn-api-frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../Thaqalayn-API
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && git push
scripts.serverlessDeploy: dotenv cross-var set AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=%AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID% && set AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=%AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY% && serverless deploy

author: Mohammed Arab
